short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix ArtikusHG's website with it's all-lowercase 'Source Code Pro' font! This makes it use Ubuntu Mono, and it looks way better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hate ArtikusHG's new website? It looks like shit, right? Well suffer no more, ArtifixHG is here!
